resources.string: Welcome to your new Android TV device powered by Google. Android TV lets you get apps from the Play Store and cast content from your phone to the TV.
Android TV lets you get apps from the Play Store and cast content from your phone to the TV.

By signing in with Google, you’ll get personalized recommendations on the home screen, and Youtube, Google Play, and other apps installed from the Play Store will automatically get updated to the latest features.
Your name is used to personalize your device and Google Services.
"You can't use this name with Google+ because it contains invalid characters."
"You can't use this name with Google+ because it contains invalid characters. Trying to use a nickname, previous name, or title? You can add them to your profile after you join."
"This name can't be used with Google+."
"You'll use this name to sign into your Google Account. You can use letters, numbers, and periods."
"Use at least 8 characters. Don't reuse passwords, or something too obvious like your pet's name."
Make sure you typed what you thought you typed.
If you ever lose your password, you can answer a security question and have a reset link emailed to a different address
Enter an answer to your security question
View Google Play Terms of Service
By continuing, you agree to the Google Terms of Service, the Google Privacy Policy, and the Google Play Terms of Service.

"This device may also receive and install updates and apps from Google and your device's manufacturer. Some apps may be downloaded and installed if you continue, and you can remove them or adjust their permissions at any time."
Short passwords are easy to guess. Try one with at least 8 characters.
Common words are easy to guess.
Only letters (a–z), numbers (0–9) and periods (.) are allowed.
Your username is limited to 30 characters.
Your username must contain at least 6 characters.
"Type a valid email address. Example: bruce@example.com"
"%1$s is not available. Try another username"
"Your username and password don't match. Please verify them and try again."
There was a problem signing in automatically. Cancel to try other methods.
By signing in, you are agreeing to the Google Terms of Service, Google Privacy Policy, and Additional Terms of Service.
Your account administrator requires another sign-in step for extra security.
Your account administrator requires another sign-in step for extra security.
For security reasons, please enter the text displayed below.
The Google account \"%1$s\" is signed in. This can be changed in Settings once setup is complete.
Continue signing in on your mobile device.
Continue signing in on your computer.
Continue signing in on your other device.
Be sure to connect your phone or laptop to the same network as your %1$s. Then enter this code:
You can use the web to log into your account or create a new one.
"Your device isn't connected to the Internet. To view this information now, go to %s in a web browser."
"Let Google and third party apps with your permission use your device's location."

"Help improve your Android TV by automatically sending diagnostic and usage data to Google. This information won't be used to identify you and helps teams working on things like app performance and new Google features. Learn more at http://g.co/AndroidUsageHelp."
You typed an incorrect password or your account has changed. Re-type your password. If you forgot your password and need to recover your account click here.
Use an app-specific password instead of your regular account password.

"This account hasn't been verified. Check your email and follow the included link to verify this account.
(To recover your account information, go to http://www.google.com/accounts/recovery on your computer.)"

"This account has been disabled.
(For details, visit http://google.com/accounts with a web browser.)"
The password is too weak or contains invalid characters. Try again.

"Your username and password don't match. Try again.
To recover your account info, go to google.com/accounts/recovery/."
"Your request to join Google+ didn't go through. Try again later from any web browser at plus.google.com."
A change in your account requires that you sign in again.
This account already exists on your device
